DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.NAME: Block Strike
DeepSpiringMod:BlockStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain your hand this turn.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.NAME: Stochastic Process
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! card from your discard pile randomly.
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticProcess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, draw !M! cards from your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: Your GPU ran out of VRAM. NL Unplayable. NL Ethereal.
DeepSpiringMod:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Restart deepspikingmod:forward_propagation. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card has not been upgraded and cannot be played.

DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.NAME: Attention Head
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 1 card.
DeepSpiringMod:AttentionHead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When triggering deepspikingmod:forward_propagation and this card is in the discard pile, play the next 2 cards.

DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.NAME: Forward Propagation
DeepSpiringMod:ForwardPropagation.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Activate all *Attention *Head and *Convolution *Kernel 's effects in discard pile.

DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.NAME: Positional Encoding
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 2 cards in the discard pile.
DeepSpiringMod:PositionalEncoding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap the positions of 4 cards in the discard pile.

DeepSpiringMod:FeatureMap.NAME: Feature Map
DeepSpiringMod:FeatureMap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.NAME: Stochastic Gradient Descent
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP or 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting randomly with equal chance.
DeepSpiringMod:StochasticGradientDescent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 2 stacks of deepspiringmod:AP or 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting randomly with equal chance.

DeepSpiringMod:Misconduct.NAME: Misconduct
DeepSpiringMod:Misconduct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! stacks of deepspiringmod:AP . At the start of each turn, gain a stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:StrikeDataset.NAME: Strike Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:StrikeDataset.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage !M! times. NL Per one layer higher deepspiringmod:AP than deepspiringmod:Overfitting , this card deals damage for an additional time.

DeepSpiringMod:DefendDataset.NAME: Defend Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:DefendDataset.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 10 points of Block for each stack of deepspiringmod:AP that is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting.

DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.NAME: Charge Dataset
DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] . NL For each layer that deepspiringmod:AP is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting , this card's cost is reduced by 1.
DeepSpiringMod:ChargeDataset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] [E] . NL For each layer that deepspiringmod:AP is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting , this card's cost is reduced by 1.

DeepSpiringMod:ScalingLaw.NAME: Scaling Law
DeepSpiringMod:ScalingLaw.DESCRIPTION: Double your deepspiringmod:AP. NL Halve deepspiringmod:Overfitting . NL Exhaust .
DeepSpiringMod:ScalingLaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your deepspiringmod:AP. NL Halve deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:Hallucination.NAME: Hallucination
DeepSpiringMod:Hallucination.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. Gain !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Hallucination .

DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.NAME: Diffusion
DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.DESCRIPTION: Turn this card into a selected card from the draw pile. NL Exhaust.
DeepSpiringMod:Diffusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Turn this card into a selected card from the draw pile. NL cards will inherit the cost. NL Exhaust.

DeepSpiringMod:AIForm.NAME: AI Form
DeepSpiringMod:AIForm.DESCRIPTION: No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL Each turn, one *Attention *Head , *Forward *Propagation , *Positional *Encoding , and one random card are placed in hand.
DeepSpiringMod:AIForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: No cards will be drawn at the start of the turn. NL Each turn, one *Attention *Head , *Forward *Propagation , *Positional *Encoding , and one random card are placed in hand. NL Retain .

DeepSpiringMod:RecurrentNeuralNetwork.NAME: Recurrent Neural Network
DeepSpiringMod:RecurrentNeuralNetwork.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card you have played for !M! time. NL The number of times is the number of stacks deepspiringmod:AP is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting.
DeepSpiringMod:RecurrentNeuralNetwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the last card you have played for !M! times. NL The number of times is the number of stacks deepspiringmod:AP is higher than deepspiringmod:Overfitting adding 1.

DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.NAME: SOTA
DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 stack of deepspiringmod:AP , 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:SOTA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 stack of deepspiringmod:AP , 1 stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting . NL You will ignore deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:KFord.NAME: K-Ford
DeepSpiringMod:KFord.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! point of Block. NL Reduce !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .
DeepSpiringMod:KFord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! point of Block. NL Reduce !M! stack of deepspiringmod:Overfitting .

DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.NAME: Long Training
DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and 2 stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting.
DeepSpiringMod:LongTraining.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Causing !D! points of damage. NL Gain 1 stack of deepspiringmod:AP and 2 stacks of deepspiringmod:Overfitting.

DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.NAME: Regularization
DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL You will no longer gain deepspiringmod:Overfitting this turn.
DeepSpiringMod:Regularization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! points of Block. NL You will no longer gain deepspiringmod:Overfitting this turn.
